items.sentence: I told Tom I\'d close the windows and lock up.
I tried to leave, but Tom wouldn\'t let me go.
I hope that you can get that done before 2:30.
I just asked because I thought you would know.
I can\'t really believe all this is happening.
I can\'t remember what I had to eat yesterday.
I assure you everything will be ready on time.
I bet Tom thirty dollars that I could do that.
I burned all the letters that you wrote to me.
I came to talk with your father, not with you.
